hero.title: Premium Pollack Perfected with Deep Sea Water
hero.subtitle: Goseong Myeongtae provides unmatched taste and nutrition in our Hwangtae and Kodari products, processed with patented deep sea water technology

patent.title: Patented Technology
patent.description: We maximize flavor and nutrition by utilizing mineral-rich deep sea water from 605m depth in our patented washing, aging, and freezing processes

nutrition.title: Scientifically Proven Nutrition
nutrition.description: Scientific studies prove that our products contain significantly higher levels of essential minerals and sulfur amino acids compared to regular dried pollack

supply.title: Stable Raw Material Supply
supply.description: Through official agreements with Slavianka, Russia, we have secured a stable supply of over 30,000 tons of pollack annually

step1.title: Raw Material Supply
step1.description: We directly import the highest quality pollack from Russia

step2.title: Processing
step2.description: We process through thawing, washing, and processing using deep sea water injection in our hygienic facilities preparing for HACCP certification

step3.title: Drying
step3.description: Natural drying with the clean sea breeze of Goseong, the homeland of pollack, adds deep flavor

hwangtaepo.title: Goseong Hwangtae-po
hwangtaepo.description: Ideal for grilling and steaming traditional dishes, boasting deep and rich flavors

hwangtaechae.title: Goseong Hwangtae-chae
hwangtaechae.description: Perfect for soup dishes and seasoned salads, creating clean and savory broth

kodari.title: Goseong Kodari
kodari.description: Excellent chewy texture, semi-dried product optimized for braised or steamed dishes

university.title: Kyungdong University Deep Sea Water Dept.

cta.title: Create Successful Business with Goseong Myeongtae
cta.subtitle: Contact us now for wholesale prices, samples, and partnership opportunities
